summary: Young Waldek wants to earn some money abroad and asks his experienced neighbour, Mr Kuka, for advice. When he finally gets to Vienna, he can confront the reality with what he has been told about.
cast: Lukasz Garlicki|August Diehl|Nadia Cameron-Blakey|Andrzej Grabowski|Anna Przybylska|Miroslaw Zbrojewicz|Tomasz Karolak|Lukasz Simlat|Krzysztof Stroinski|Krista Stadler|Branko Samarovski|Günter Großmann|Lech Mackiewicz|Piotr Zelt|Wojciech Czerwinski|Mariusz Slupinski|Andreas Ban|Karolina Chapko|Paulina Chapko|Gerda Drabek|Józef Hamkalo|Alexander Jagsch|Marek Kasprzyk|Marek Lipski|Maciej Mikulski|Rudi Mühllehner|Lukas Resetarits|Halina Skoczynska|Oana Solomon|Grzegorz Stelmaszewski|Alexander Strobele|Johannes Zeiler
title: Lekcje pana Kuki
